name: ccm2svn
short_description:
Script migrates history from IBM Rational Synergy to Subversion.
It migrates only non-working projects, starting from historic roots and following the 'successor' relationship to get further versions.
It generates an SVN tag for each such project version
It commits to Subversion only diffs between predecessor and successor so minimizing SVN space used
It uses the loose components methodology, where tags folder is created under subfolder with the project name + project instance in case of multiple independent projects existing with the same name.
summary: Migrate project history from CM Synergy to tags in Subversion
